Name: Recorded Future
Author: Recorded Future Premier Integrations - support@recordedfuture.com
Description:
[Recorded Future](https://www.recordedfuture.com/) is the worlds largest provider of intelligence for enterprise security. By combining persistent and pervasive automated data collection and analytics with human analysis, Recorded Future delivers intelligence that is timely, accurate, and actionable.

Playbooks have internal dependencies to RecordedFuture-ImportToSentinel so install the RecordedFuture-ImportToSentinel playbook before any of the others. 

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution takes a dependency on functionality like Azure Logic Apps, Azure Monitor Logs. Some of these dependencies might result in additional ingestion or operational costs.

* [Azure Logic Apps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/logic-apps/) 
* [Design a Log Analytics workspace](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/logs/workspace-design) 
* [Work with Threat Indicators](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/work-with-threat-indicators)
